tool_description: AI-powered API for crypto asset price forecasting offers a range of features and benefits that can revolutionize how traders and investors navigate the dynamic and often unpredictable crypto market.
title: The Apophis

api_list.name: getForecastlList (Mega)
api_list.description: Get Full Crypto Asset List with Expected Daily Forecast Change
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-apophis.p.rapidapi.com/assets/full_list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-apophis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getAssetsList (Pro+)
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of available assets for forecasting
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-apophis.p.rapidapi.com/assets"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-apophis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
